source.name: Database with Open OnDemand usage data

destination.name: Database with Open OnDemand usage data

migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.name: AddNoVNCApps
migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.description: Identify noVNC apps from the page_impressions table and add them to the apps table.

migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.name: CreateNoVNCRequestPathIdToAppIdMap
migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.description: Create a temporary table mapping noVNC request path IDs to app IDs.

migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.name: MigratePageImpressions
migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.description: Migrate the contents of the page_impressions table to a new table that stores reverse_proxy_port instead of reverse_proxy_port_id.

migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.name: CleanUpPageImpressions
migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.description: Replace the page_impressions table with the new table, delete the reverse_proxy_ports table.

migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.name: AddPageImpressionsIndices
migrate-page-impressions-11_0_0-11_0_1.description: Add the indexes back to the page_impressions table.
